fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- During the day, choose to observe a player, learning all whispers they received and sent that day the following night. If your target dies that night, they will be cleaned.
- Prepare a Strike on a player. Strikes will activate the following morning.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If one or more Striked players are alive, you gain access to an extra anonymous vote.
- If two or more Striked players are alive, you gain basic defense.
